calls.title: NovaTech Discovery Call
takeaways: Strong pain identified: data pipeline management costing them $2M/yr in engineering time
Budget approved for Q2 integration project — $400-500K range
Decision timeline: 4 weeks, needs board approval for deals >$300K
Key competitor in consideration: DataFlow (but lacking enterprise features)
Follow-up: send technical architecture doc + schedule demo with their CTO
calls.nextSteps: Technical demo scheduled for Feb 28. Send ROI calculator by Feb 24.

calls.title: Helios Negotiation — Final Terms
takeaways: Deal essentially closed — negotiating implementation timeline
They want dedicated CSM for first 6 months (agreed)
Contract value: $450K annual, 3-year commitment with 5% annual escalator
Legal review in progress — expect signed contract by Feb 28
Upsell opportunity: their APAC team (additional $200K potential)
calls.nextSteps: Legal to finalize MSA by Feb 25. Kickoff planning meeting scheduled Mar 3.

calls.title: Orion Ventures — Cold Outreach Follow-up
takeaways: Early stage — they're aware of the problem but not actively solving it
Current stack: manual processes + spreadsheets for portfolio management
Budget cycle starts Q3 — unlikely to close before July
Marcus is an influencer, not the decision maker (CEO approval needed)
Offered to send case study from similar venture firm
calls.nextSteps: Send venture portfolio management case study. Re-engage in June for Q3 budget cycle.
